name: Clear Set Shoulder Bag
description:
Clear set shoulder bag made for professionals in the Make Up Industry.  Suitable for carrying make up, stylist or art department equipment on set. Essential for location/set work.

Made from heavy duty clear PVC it is durable, strong and waterproof. The zipped main compartment has divides for separating all your make up and bits. The outer zipped pocket which is a tissue holder/dispenser has an easy access slot. 

The thick strap is adjustable and extends up to 127cm long. 

The bag measures 24.5cm x high 38cm long x 8.5cm deep. 

For international postage please contact me for a price.

name: Clear Large Tote Bag
description:
This is a large Clear PVC Tote Bag made for professionals in the Make Up Industry and is suitable for carrying make up, stylist or art department equipment on set. 

Made from heavy duty clear PVC this bag is durable, lightweight, strong and waterproof.  The thick straps support the balance and weight distribution of this bag when full. 

Zip closure to 1 main compartment. 

The bag measures 40cm x high 60cm long x 17cm deep and comes as new without tags. 

Essential for location/set work.

For international postage please contact me for a price.
